name: Starfighter (Lil Cthulhu)
description:
Commander! There is a hostile alien fleet in front of us! Attack and destroy as many enemies as possible! A simple shoot-em-up game in the style of good old Atari 2600 games. Made with Godot v3.4.2. Happy playing.

Controls:

  • Let / Right / Up / Down = Arrow keys / Xbox Stick
  • Fire = Space / Xbox A
  • Pause = Esc / Xbox Start
  • Self Destruct = Del / Xbox Y
